register.requirement2: Should include numbers or special characters for extra security.
register.errorTerms: You must agree to the terms and conditions.
register.errorGeneric: Something went wrong while creating your account.
register.success: Your account has been created successfully.
register.termsIntro: By creating an account you confirm that you understand and accept our policies.
register.termsPoint1: We only use your information to create and secure your account.
register.termsPoint2: You can update your notification preferences at any time.
register.termsPoint3: Deleting your account will remove your data from our active systems within 30 days.
register.termsOutro: Please contact our support team if you have any questions about how we handle your data.
